articles.title: A 90-Foot Asteroid, Travelling At 29,961 kmph, Will Zoom Past Earth Today - NDTV
articles.description: A 99-foot wide asteroid, named 2024 KA1, will fly close to Earth on Saturday. This celestial visitor is travelling at a speed of 29,961 kmph, and will make its closest approach to Earth at 16:36 IST.
articles.content:
The 2024 KA1 has been categorised within the Apollo group of asteroids.
A 99-foot wide asteroid, named 2024 KA1, will fly close to Earth on Saturday. This celestial visitor is travelling at a speed … [+1911 chars]

articles.title: Strange Radio Signal From Deep Space Baffles Scientists - ScienceAlert
articles.description: We've received a strange signal from across the galaxy, and astronomers are struggling to understand what it means.
articles.content:
We've received a strange signal from across the galaxy, and astronomers are struggling to understand what it means.
